plot: Felix finds a young man by the beach. He takes him home to take care of him, he then realizes he has scales on his back.
title: Félix et le poisson
plot_es: Felix finds a young man by the beach. He takes him home to take care of him, he then realizes he has scales on his back.
plot_en: Felix finds a young man by the beach. He takes him home to take care of him, he then realizes he has scales on his back.
